description:
Here's the command I ran:

nova boot --image=1 --flavor=2 --meta one=two trouser

The flat_injected flag is set to 'false'. I get the following traceback from nova-compute.log: http://paste.openstack.org/show/2274/
title: Cannot boot instance with metadata

comments.content:
Here's the command I ran:

nova boot --image=1 --flavor=2 --meta one=two trouser

The flat_injected flag is set to 'false'. I get the following traceback from nova-compute.log: http://paste.openstack.org/show/2274/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon

comments.content: The recent config-drive MP added a code path that bypassed the flat_injected flag in virt/xenapi/vmops.py
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
